analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka landa ka'i gnas na bzhugs te /

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One addressed the monks:

original: dge slong dag la lo rnams kyi dus bshad par bya yi /
analyzed: dge slong dag la lo rnams kyi dus bshad par bya yi /

original: de legs par nyon cig /
analyzed: de legs par nyon cig /

analyzed: dge slong rnams dgun zla ra ba'i phyed dang po la ni /

analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa phyed dang lnga ni /

analyzed: dus ma yin no //
translated: are not the time.

original: zla ba phyed dang gnyis pa la ni /
analyzed: zla ba phyed dang gnyis pa la ni /
translated: In the second half of the first winter month,

original: rkang pa brgyad gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: eight feet are the time of the Ghandas.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa drug ni /
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa drug ni /
translated: Six feet less than a cubit

original: dus ma yin no //
analyzed: dus ma yin no //
translated: are not the time.

original: dgun zla 'bring po'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni /
analyzed: dgun zla 'bring po'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni /
translated: In the first half of the middle month of winter,

original: rkang pa dgu gand'i'i dus yin la /üîΩsor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bdun ni /
analyzed: rkang pa dgu gand'i'i dus yin la / sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bdun ni /
translated: nine finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: dus ma yin no //
analyzed: dus ma yin no //
translated: Seven finger lengths less than that are not the time.

original: zla ba gnyis pa la ni /üîΩrkang pa @563a *//
analyzed: zla ba gnyis pa la ni / rkang pa @563a *//
translated: In the second month,

original: bcu gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: bcu gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: ten finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa brgyad ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa brgyad ni dus ma yin no //
translated: Eight finger lengths less than that are not the time.

original: dgun zla tha chung gi zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bcu gcig gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: dgun zla tha chung gi zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bcu gcig gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the last month of winter, eleven finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa dgu ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa dgu ni dus ma yin no //
translated: Nine finger lengths less than that are not the time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa bcu gnyis gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa bcu gnyis gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of that month, twelve finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang ba bcu ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang ba bcu ni dus ma yin no //
translated: Ten finger lengths less than that are not the time.

original: dpying zla ra ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bcu gcig gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: dpying zla ra ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bcu gcig gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the first month of spring, eleven finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa dgu ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa dgu ni dus ma yin no //
translated: Nine finger lengths less than that are not the time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa bcu gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa bcu gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of the second month, the time of the vital points is ten steps.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa brgyad ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa brgyad ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The eight steps less one are not the time.

original: dpyid zla 'bring po'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa dgu gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: dpyid zla 'bring po'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa dgu gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the middle month of spring, the time of the vital points is nine steps.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bdun ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bdun ni ma yin no //
translated: The seven steps less one are not the time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa brgyad gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa brgyad gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of the month, the time of the vital points is eight steps.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa drug ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa drug ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The six steps less one are not the time.

original: dpyid zla tha chung gi zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bdun gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: dpyid zla tha chung gi zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bdun gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the last month of spring, the time of the vital points is seven steps.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa lnga ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa lnga ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The five steps less one are not the time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa drug gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa drug gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of the month, the time of the vital points is six steps.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bzhi ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bzhi ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The four steps less one are not the time.

original: dbyar zla ra ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa drug gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: dbyar zla ra ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa drug gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the first month of summer, the time of the vital points is six steps.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bzhi ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bzhi ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The four fingers less than a quarter is not the right time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa @563b lnga gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa @563b lnga gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of the month, the four fingers are the right time.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gsum pa ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gsum pa ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The three fingers less than a quarter is not the right time.

original: dbyar zla 'bring bo'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bzhi gand'i'i 'dus yin la /
analyzed: dbyar zla 'bring bo'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bzhi gand'i'i 'dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the middle month of summer, the four fingers are the right time.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gsum ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gsum ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The three fingers less than a quarter is not the right time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa bzhi gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa bzhi gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of the month, the four fingers are the right time.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The two fingers less than a quarter is not the right time.

original: dbyar zla tha chung gi zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa gsum gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: dbyar zla tha chung gi zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa gsum gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the last month of summer, the three fingers are the right time.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis pa ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis pa ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The two fingers less than a quarter is not the right time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la rkang pa gsum gand'i'i 'dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la rkang pa gsum gand'i'i 'dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of the month, the three fingers are the right time.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The two fingers less than a quarter is not the right time.

original: ston zla ra ba'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa gsum gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: ston zla ra ba'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa gsum gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the first autumn month, three finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa phyed dang gsum ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa phyed dang gsum ni dus ma yin no //
translated: One and a half finger lengths less than that is not the time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa gnyis gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa gnyis gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of that month, two finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa phyed ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa phyed ni dus ma yin no //
translated: One finger length less than that is not the time.

original: ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bzhi gand'i'i 'dus yin la /
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa bzhi gand'i'i 'dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the middle autumn month, four finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni dus ma yin no //
translated: Two finger lengths less than that is not the time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang ba bzhi gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang ba bzhi gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of that month, four finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gnyis ni dus ma yin no //
translated: Two finger lengths less than that is not the time.

original: ston zla tha chung gi zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa lnga gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: ston zla tha chung gi zla ba phyed dang po la ni rkang pa lnga gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the first half of the last autumn month, five finger lengths are the time of the vital point.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gsum ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa gsum ni dus ma yin no //
translated: Three finger lengths less than that is not the time.

original: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa drug gand'i'i dus yin la /
analyzed: zla ba phyed gnyis pa la ni rkang pa drug gand'i'i dus yin la /
translated: In the second half of the month, the six feet are the time of the joints.

original: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bzhi ni dus ma yin no //
analyzed: sor gyis dman pa'i rkang pa bzhi ni dus ma yin no //
translated: The four feet less one finger are not the time.
